entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
